text: Buzurgoṅ aur shahr ke darwāze par baiṭhe dīgar mardoṅ ne is kī tasdīq kī, “Ham gawāh haiṅ! Rab āp ke ghar meṅ āne wālī is aurat ko un barkatoṅ se nawāze jin se us ne Rāḳhil aur Liyāh ko nawāzā, jin se tamām Isrāīlī nikle. Rab kare ki āp kī daulat aur izzat Ifrātā yānī Bait-laham meṅ baṛhtī jāe.
